visualization_prompt: Create a Highcharts chartOptions object to render a column chart with the title 'Highcharts responsive chart'. The chart should have three data series: 'Christmas Eve', 'Christmas Day before dinner', and 'Christmas Day after dinner'. Each series should have data points corresponding to 'Apples', 'Oranges', and 'Bananas'. The chart should be responsive, with the legend position changing to center, bottom, and horizontal layout when the chart width is 500px or less. Additionally, provide buttons to resize the chart to 400x300 and 600x300 dimensions.

subtitle.text: Resize the frame to see the legend position change

visualization_explanation: The provided Highcharts chartOptions object configures a responsive column chart with a title 'Highcharts responsive chart'. The chart includes three data series: 'Christmas Eve', 'Christmas Day before dinner', and 'Christmas Day after dinner', each with data points for 'Apples', 'Oranges', and 'Bananas'. The x-axis and y-axis labels are styled with a font size of 12px and a color of #333, while the y-axis title is styled with a font size of 14px and the same color. The legend is initially positioned to the right, vertically aligned in the middle, and laid out vertically. The chart is designed to be responsive, with the legend repositioning to the center, bottom, and horizontally laid out when the chart width is 500px or less. Additionally, buttons are provided to resize the chart to 400x300 and 600x300 dimensions, enhancing user interaction and adaptability.
